title: Android 13 Beta 1 is here with better media file permissions
content:
February saw the release of the first Android 13 Developer Preview, and with it came the groundwork for the next iteration of the world’s biggest operating system. It brought along a number of changes that benefit developers and made improvements to privacy, Material You, language controls, and more. Following that saw the advent of the second

The post Android 13 Beta 1 is here with better media file permissions appeared first on XDA.
description: Android 13 Beta 1 is here, and it brings more granular access to media files, better error reporting, and anticipatory audio routing.
